verbose_text: Moreover, we observed that dcap-2 knockdown shortened the lifespan of IFE-2-deficient animals, whereas ife-2 knockdown significantly increased the lifespan of dcap-2 (ok2023) mutants (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY D), suggesting that DCAP-2 and EDC-3 share redundant functions in aging modulation.
evidence: ife-2 knockdown significantly increased the lifespan of dcap-2(ok2023) mutants
